gg.al.character

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • gg.al.character.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ezreal, Ghost, Kevin, SuperGhost

    public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Thomas Neumann on 23.05.2017.
    Main sandbox superclass for all characters.

    • Nested Class Summary

        public void cast(int abilityInd)
        Method for starting the cast of an ability. Checks prerequisites like cooldown and cost before starting the cast.
        Parameters:
        abilityInd - the ability to be evoked

      • getCooldownTimer

        public float getCooldownTimer(int ability)

      • tick

        public void tick(float delta)
        Called every time the entity enginge updates. Updates the current cooldowns and cast times, and casts the abilities if ready.
        Parameters:
        delta - the time since last frame

      • startAttack

        public void startAttack()
        Starts one auto-attack.

      • stopAttack

        public void stopAttack()
        Stops the current running auto-attack completely.

      • resetAttack

        public void resetAttack()
        Stops the auto-attack, and clears the target of the character.

      • cancelAttack

        public void cancelAttack()
        Stops the running auto-attack only if it is not in the accomplished phase.

        Logic portion of the auto-attack. May be overridden by subclasses.
        Parameters:
        enemyId - the enemy to apply damage to

        Called after successful cast of ability. Apply logic of abilities here.
        Parameters:
        abilityInd - the ability to be cast

      • modifyCost

        protected float modifyCost(int ability,
                           float cost)
        Called right before calling checkOnCast(int). Should be overridden by subclasses if the cost should be modified.
        Parameters:
        ability - the ability for the cost
        cost - current cost of the ability
        Returns:
        new cost of the ability
